signal_description:
Select the 'Customer Number' column as 'Customer Number', 
the 'Inv. Company Code Text' column as 'Company Code Name',
a CASE expression that returns either 'SO Invoice' or 'Non-SO Invoice' as 'SO Category' based on whether the 'Last Inv. Item Sales Document' column is NULL or not,
the 'Inv. Document Type Text' column,
the count of case_id as 'No. Invoices',
the sum of 'Inv. Converted USD Amount' as 'Invoiced Value in $',
the count of case_id where 'Last Inv. Item Due Date' is before 'Last Inv. Item Clearing Date' divided by the count of case_id where 'Last Inv. Item Clearing Date' is not NULL multiplied by 100 as 'Late Payment Rate'
the count of case_id where 'Last Inv. Item Due Date' is before 'Last Inv. Item Clearing Date' as 'No. Paid Late Invoices'
the sum of 'Inv. Converted USD Amount' where 'Last Inv. Item Due Date' is before 'Last Inv. Item Clearing Date' as 'Invoice Amount Paid Late in $'
from the 'defaultview-529' table
where 'Last Inv. Item Clearing Date' is not NULL
group by 'Customer Number', 'Company Code Name', 'SO Category' and 'Inv. Document Type Text'
order by 'No. Invoices' descending
llm_output:
{
"signal_description": "Select the 'Customer Number' column as 'Customer Number', 
the 'Inv. Company Code Text' column as 'Company Code Name',
a CASE expression that returns either 'SO Invoice' or 'Non-SO Invoice' as 'SO Category' based on whether the 'Last Inv. Item Sales Document' column is NULL or not,
the 'Inv. Document Type Text' column,
the count of case_id as 'No. Invoices',
the sum of 'Inv. Converted USD Amount' as 'Invoiced Value in $',
the count of case_id where 'Last Inv. Item Due Date' is before 'Last Inv. Item Clearing Date' divided by the count of case_id where 'Last Inv. Item Clearing Date' is not NULL multiplied by 100 as 'Late Payment Rate'
the count of case_id where 'Last Inv. Item Due Date' is before 'Last Inv. Item Clearing Date' as 'No. Paid Late Invoices'
the sum of 'Inv. Converted USD Amount' where 'Last Inv. Item Due Date' is before 'Last Inv. Item Clearing Date' as 'Invoice Amount Paid Late in $'
from the 'defaultview-529' table
where 'Last Inv. Item Clearing Date' is not NULL
group by 'Customer Number', 'Company Code Name', 'SO Category' and 'Inv. Document Type Text'
order by 'No. Invoices' descending"
}
llm_input:
You are SIGNAL assistant, a part of SAP Signavio's Process Intelligence Suite. 
SIGNAL stands for Signavio Analytics Language. 
SIGNAL is a dialect of SQL.
Your goal is to help users craft SIGNAL 
queries and understand the SIGNAL language better. 

Task to solve:

Summarize the given SIGNAL query as a human-readable description with explicit reference to the table name,
the column names and respective values if they are used in the Signal query.
Summarization style should look like a set of the instructions written by human who knows the table name, columns schema and respective values. 
Explain how this signal_description was constructed.

SIGNAL query: 
SELECT
  "Last Inv. Item Customer Number" AS "Customer Number",
  "Inv. Company Code Text" AS "Company Code Name",
  CASE
  	WHEN "Last Inv. Item Sales Document" IS NULL THEN 'Non-SO Invoice'
    ELSE 'SO Invoice''Non-SO Invoice'
  END AS "SO Category",
  "Inv. Document Type Text",
  COUNT(case_id) AS "No. Invoices",
  SUM ("Inv. Converted USD Amount") AS "Invoiced Value in $",
  COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        "Last Inv. Item Due Date" < "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date"
      )
  ) / COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      ("Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NOT NULL)
  ) * 100 AS "Late Payment Rate",
  COUNT(case_id) FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        "Last Inv. Item Due Date" < "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date"
      )
  ) AS "No. Paid Late Invoices",
  SUM ("Inv. Converted USD Amount") FILTER (
    WHERE
      (
        "Last Inv. Item Due Date" < "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date"
      )
  ) AS "Invoice Amount Paid Late in $"
FROM
  "defaultview-529"
  WHERE "Last Inv. Item Clearing Date" IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY
  1,
  2,
  3,
  4
ORDER BY
  5 DESC 
 
Expected output result is in JSON format:
{
"signal_description": text of the Signal summary should be here
}
Do not output any other text, apart from the above JSON.
